{"id": "4e56c2cf8cfc4240ab38b96950012143", "page_content": "\u5b9a\u7406 1.1.1 (\u4ee3\u6570\u57fa\u672c\u5b9a\u7406) \u8bbe $f = X ^ { n } + a _ { n 1 } X ^ { n 1 } + \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot + a _ { 0 }$ \u4e3a\u4ee5 $X$ \u4e3a\u53d8\u5143\u7684\u590d\u7cfb\u6570 $n$ \u6b21\u591a\u9879\u5f0f, \u5176\u4e2d $n \\in \\mathbb { Z } _ { \\geq 1 }$ , \u5219\u5b58\u5728 $x _ { 1 } , \\ldots , x _ { n } \\in \\mathbb { C }$ \u4f7f\u5f97", "metadata": {"page_num": 28, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d", "chunk_type": "theorem", "initial_id": "63509c40a4a643eea520a859dd8f040e"}}

{"id": "c792248efcfb46399205f738cfbbf608", "page_content": "\u7ec3\u4e60 1.1.4 \u8bbe $X ^ { 3 } + p X + q \\ : = \\ : ( X x _ { 1 } ) ( X x _ { 2 } ) ( X x _ { 3 } )$ . \u4ee5\u4e0a\u8ff0\u516c\u5f0f\u5b9a\u4e49$u _ { 1 } , \\ldots , v _ { 3 }$ . \u8bf4\u660e $x _ { i } = u _ { i } + v _ { i }$ \u5bf9 $i = { 1 , 2 , 3 }$ \u6210\u7acb.", "metadata": {"page_num": 32, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d", "chunk_type": "exercise", "initial_id": "c4696aa0b49a4858a96da31250fd0f07"}}

{"id": "52d2720e80d64ce3814bfbb0776577a5", "page_content": "\u7ec3\u4e60 1.2.1 (D. Zagier) \u8bbe $p$ \u4e3a\u7d20\u6570, $p$ \u9664\u4ee5 4 \u4f59 1. \u6309\u4ee5\u4e0b\u8bba\u8bc1\u8bf4\u660e\u5b58\u5728 $x , y \\in \\mathbb { Z }$ \u4f7f\u5f97 $x ^ { 2 } + y ^ { 2 } = p$ : \u5b9a\u4e49\u6709\u9650\u96c6\n$$ S : = \\left\\{ ( x , y , z ) \\in \\mathbb { Z } _ { \\geq 1 } : x ^ { 2 } + 4 y z = p \\right\\} . $$", "metadata": {"page_num": 35, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d", "chunk_type": "exercise", "initial_id": "4cfe490d12204a7ab5bfe5a5a41df8dd"}}
